hints.title: Main Research Question
hints.content:
361: :label: prob-revival-kl-mean-field
362: 
363: Let $\mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d]$ be the mean-field revival operator defined in [05_mean_field.md](../1_euclidean_gas/07_mean_field.md):
364: 
365: $$
366: \mathcal{R}[\rho, m_d](x,v) = \lambda_{\text{revive}} \cdot m_d \cdot \frac{\rho(x,v)}{\int_\Omega \rho}
367: $$
368: 
369: where $m_d = 1 - \int_\Omega \rho$ is the dead mass and $\lambda_{\text{revive}}$ is the revival rate.
370: 
371: **Question**: Is $\mathcal{R}$ **KL-non-expansive**? That is, does it satisfy:
372: 
373: $$
374: D_{\text{KL}}(\mathcal{R}(\rho) \| \mathcal{R}(\sigma)) \le D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \sigma)
375: $$
376: 
377: for all alive densities $\rho, \sigma \in \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$ with $\int \rho = \int \sigma < 1$?
378: 
379: **Status**: **RESOLVED** - See Section 7 and Stage 2
